casebody.data:
PHG ASHEVILLE, LLC
v.
CITY OF ASHEVILLE No. 434PA18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2019 Catherine A. Hofmann, Assistant City Attorney, Robin Tatum Currin, City Attorney, Andrew H. Erteschik, Chad W. Essick, Colin R. McGrath, N. Cosmo Zinkow, Attorneys at Law, Raleigh, For City Of Asheville. Thomas E. Terrell, Jr., Kip David Nelson, Attorneys at Law, Greensboro, For PHG Asheville, LLC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 11th of December 2018 by Respondent in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2019."

Therefore the case is docketed as of the date of this order's certification. Briefs of the respective parties shall be submitted to this Court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 15(g)(2).
